OR peek at 3 Relgion Traits.

trial_in_chief.text: Either -1 Ins;
OR discard this and any 1 or 2 other cards in your hand and redraw that many cards from the deck.

summation.text: No special event

George Holmes Young.notes: After playing this card during the Trial In Chief or Summation round, the Officers Recalled Card Events can be played.

trial_in_chief.text: +1 Gui and 1-> to any aspect.

summation.text: 1-> to all Occupation Traits.

Gen. Frederick Middleton.notes: After playing this card during the Trial or Summation round, the Officers Recalled Card Events can be played.

trial_in_chief.text: +1 Gui, 2-> to the English aspect, and 1-> to the Government aspect.

summation.text: 2-> each to the Occupation Trait aspect, and 2-> to the English aspect, and 1-> to the Catholic aspect.

Officers Recalled.notes: Cannot use the Trial or Summation Events on this card unless either General Middleton or George Holmes Young have been played.

trial_in_chief.text: -1 Ins;
OR <-2-> to the Catholic aspect.

summation.text: -1 Ins.

jury_selection.text: If you are the prosecution, peek at 2 Traits; if you are the Defense, peek at 1 Trait.

trial_in_chief.text: Prosecution can play in reaction to cancel a Defense Event;
Play to remove all Sway markers affecting one aspect, and then <-2-> that aspect;
Play to place 2 Sway markers (total) on any Juror(s), even locked ones.
trial_in_chief.desc: Select Jurors to place 2 Sway markers

summation.text: Prosecution can play in reaction to cancel a Defense Event;
Place 2 Sway markers (total) on Unlocked Jurors (only);
summation.desc: Select Jurors to place 2 Sway markers

summation.text: Play to remove all Sway markers affecting one Juror, even a Locked one, and then place one Sway marker on that Juror.
